patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,29 +1,24 @@
-{
-  "env": {
-    "node": true,
-    "es2020": true,
-    "browser": true
-  },
-  "extends": ["eslint:recommended", "plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended"],
-  "parser": "@typescript-eslint/parser",
-  "plugins": ["@typescript-eslint"],
-  "parserOptions": {
-    "ecmaVersion": 12,
-    "sourceType": "module"
-  },
-  "rules": {
-    // Custom ESLint rules go here
-    "react/react-in-jsx-scope": "off", // Next.js doesn"t require React to be imported in each file
-    "no-console": "off", // Allow console statements for debugging
-    "semi": ["error", "always"], // Enforce semicolons
-    "quotes": ["error", "single"], // Enforce single quotes
-    "jsx-quotes": ["error", "prefer-double"], // Enforce double quotes in JSX
-    "eqeqeq": "error", // Require strict equality operators
-    "react/jsx-props-no-spreading": "off", // Allow props spreading
-    "react/prop-types": "off",
-    "no-undef": "error",
-    "@typescript-eslint/explicit-module-boundary-types": "off",
-    "no-unused-vars": "error",
-    "@typescript-eslint/no-require-imports": "off"
-  }
-}
+{
+  "env": {
+    "node": true,
+    "es2020": true,
+    "browser": true
+  },
+  "extends": [
+    "eslint:recommended",
+    "next/core-web-vitals"
+  ],
+  "parserOptions": {
+    "ecmaVersion": 12,
+    "sourceType": "module"
+  },
+  "rules": {
+    "no-console": "off",
+    "semi": ["error", "always"],
+    "quotes": ["error", "single"],
+    "jsx-quotes": ["error", "prefer-double"],
+    "eqeqeq": "error",
+    "no-undef": "error",
+    "no-unused-vars": "error"
+  }
+}

commits.name: Commit-0
